DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study estimate effect anakinra , 100 mg daily ( QD ) , development anti-tetanus antibody response subject RA vaccination tetanus diphtheria toxoid injection . In addition , study evaluate general safety profile therapy anakinra , 100 mg QD , subject RA vaccination tetanus diphtheria toxoid injection .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Effect Anakinra ( r-metHuIL-1ra ) Vaccine AntibodyResponse Subjects With Rheumatoid Arthritis ( RA )
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed RA American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) criteria great equal 12 week Active RA least 3 swollen joint 3 tender/painful joint least one following : Morning stiffness great equal 45 minute ; Creactive protein ( CRP ) great equal 1.5 mg/dL ; Erythrocyte sedimentation rate great equal 28 mm/hr ; Stable methotrexate dose less equal 20 mg/week 8 week prior randomization ; Stable dos nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) oral corticosteroid ( less equal 10 mg/day prednisone equivalent ) 4 week prior randomization . Pregnant breastfeed woman Any uncontrolled , clinically significant systemic disease Has total white cell count le 3.5 x 10^9/L , neutrophil count less 2.0 x 10^9/L , platelet count le 125 x 10^9/L hemoglobin ( Hgb ) less 8.0 g/dL screen Abnormal liver function test ( AST/ALT great equal 1.5 x upper limit normal screening ) Serum creatinine great 1.5 x upper limit normal screen Subject recall tetanus toxoid diphtheria vaccination le 10 year prior randomization Has never receive primary tetanus vaccination Any vaccination within 12 week randomization Diseasemodifying antirheumatic drug ( DMARDs ) methotrexate Biologics treat RA within previous 8 week screen ( e.g. , etanercept , infliximab ) Subjects treated anakinra within 4 week prior randomization
